title: ICICI Bank offers special deals on iPhone 16 and other Apple products
description: ICICI Bank has announced special offers for customers purchasing Apple products, including up to Rs 5,000 cashback on iPhone 16 purchases using credit cards and EMI options. Additional cashback is available on Apple Watch and AirPods. The offer is valid until December 31, 2024, and includes exclusive benefits for ICICI Bank credit card holders.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
